name: audio-music-generation
title: AI Music Generation with Stable Audio
description: Generate original music and sound effects from text descriptions.
extendedDescription: Create original music and sound effects with AI using this Stable Audio workflow. Simply describe the music you want - genre, mood, instruments, tempo - and let the model generate unique compositions. From ambient soundscapes to upbeat tracks, this workflow handles a wide range of audio generation tasks. Great for content creators, game developers, and musicians seeking inspiration.
howToUse: Describe your desired audio in the prompt (e.g., 'upbeat electronic dance music with synths')
Choose audio quality settings (sample rate, format)
metaDescription: Generate AI music and sound effects with Stable Audio in ComfyUI. Free workflow template for text-to-audio generation.

faqItems.question: Can I use generated music commercially?
faqItems.answer: Check the Stable Audio license terms. Generally, outputs are usable for commercial projects, but verify current licensing.

faqItems.question: What audio formats are supported?
faqItems.answer: The workflow outputs WAV by default, with optional conversion to MP3, FLAC, and OGG.
